places_with_reviews.name: Iscon The Fern Resort & Spa, Bhavnagar
address: P4RF+4FW, near Sundarvas Bungalow, Kaliyabid, Bhavnagar, Gujarat 364002, India

reviews.text: "Iscon The Fern Resort and Spa in Bhavnagar offers spacious and clean rooms with modern amenities, ensuring a comfortable stay. The friendly staff provides excellent service, and the resort boasts a range of facilities including a swimming pool and spa. Guests appreciate its serene location and delicious dining options. Overall, it offers great value for money."

Wonderful rooms.
Their amenities are very nice. We played a lot. They had kids zone, squash court, badminton court, indoor games and an awesome swimming pool. The food was also brilliant. Loved the stay over all.
There were no much stays in Bhavnagar. This was the only good one which we could see when booked. Didn't expect it to be this good!

Rooms are spacious and clean. However, the free dinner offered with the package was a disappointment. We went to have dinner on 6 Mar 24 at 8:30pm and food was not ready. Dinner time communicated to us during checkin was 7-10pm. It was ready at 9pm apparently because a wedding group was the priority. The customers in the hotel were left waiting until the wedding group was ready for dinner. Ridiculous planning. If you are a couple, good luck.

This is really nice place to stay in Bhavnagar. Location is good and food  quality also very good. Service is at the top notch. Even we checked-in late we didn't have any problem. Also left the room early morning but we have not faced any problem. Only thing is we could not get the chance to explore other things. Such as Swimming pool, Jim etc. We had dinner there and food quality is good as well as service. Staff is very cooperative. Overall nice place to stay with family.

Old proparty iscorn. Name by fern but sarvish not good. Local pablic memarship by club . Vistar not comfartebal use swimingpool and gym by local pablic membarship. Rooms not good . I think farn name bad experience this property.

places_with_reviews.name: Efcee Sarovar Premiere, Bhavnagar
address: Opposite, Victoria Park Rd, near Vidhyanagar, ISCON Mega City, Vidhyanagar, Bhavnagar, Gujarat 364002, India

reviews.text: We stayed here 2 nights . This is a lovely hotel. The pastries in the lobby are very good as is the restaurant Victoria. We did not try the other. We had the buffet which was a nice selection. The room was excellent, very clean. Comfortable beds, choice of pillows and a nice shower (Americans are obsessed with good plumbing). They arranged transportation to the temple and box breakfasts. Very efficient. Our only problem was at check out. We were leaving at 0500. Their payment systems were all down.  It was not our card as I checked with the credit card company. There seemed to be no back up system except a direct wire transfer from our bank in the USA which would not be possible. They wanted us to pay cash. In short I would say if you are leaving at an odd time, settle the account the prior evening when there are options. The poor guy at the desk had no authority though he tried to help. We finally left dollars at a normal exchange rate not the poor rate they were offering us as our ride was waiting and we would miss out connection.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at Efcee Sarovar Premiere in Bhavnagar, and it was an experience that left a lasting impression. From the moment I arrived, the hotel exuded a sense of elegance and tranquility that one would hope to find at a top-tier hospitality destination.

The rooms at Efcee Sarovar are a retreat in themselves, with plush bedding, modern decor, and all the amenities needed for a comfortable stay. The large windows offered a picturesque view of the city, which added to the charm and serenity of the room.

Dining at the hotel was a highlight with multiple options to choose from. The chefs clearly take pride in their culinary creations, and every dish I tried was delicious and presented with care. The local Gujarati cuisine was especially delightful and gave me a taste of the region’s rich flavors.

Efcee Sarovar’s commitment to service was evident in the staff's attentiveness. Whether it was the front desk, room service, or the restaurant staff, everyone went out of their way to ensure my needs were met with a smile. The warmth and professionalism of the team truly made my stay comfortable.

The hotel's amenities, including the well-equipped fitness center and the soothing spa, were the cherries on top of an already luxurious stay. Even the location was convenient, being close enough to local attractions and the business district, yet away from the hustle and bustle.

I would recommend Efcee Sarovar Premiere to anyone visiting Bhavnagar, be it for business or pleasure. It stands as a testament to the perfect blend of traditional hospitality and modern luxury.

The hotel is conveniently located at Victoria Park Road,  and one of the two five stars in Bhavnagar. The facility is well maintained,  and offers pure veg food. They have a choice of premiere, deluxe, executive rooms and suites to offer. The food is good and reasonably priced, as are the rooms. Overall a positive experience.

Staying at this hotel was nothing short of a luxurious escape. From the moment I entered, the impeccable service and attention to detail exceeded my expectations. The elegantly designed rooms, coupled with breathtaking views, provided a serene retreat. The staff's hospitality was exceptional, making my stay truly memorable. Every aspect of this hotel exudes excellence, from the gourmet dining options to the indulgent spa facilities. A stay here is not just accommodation; it's an experience of opulence and sophistication that lingers in your memory.

The hospitality offered is amazing. The hotel is a great package in totality ranging from sumptuous food to its ideal location, safety of personnel and belongings to the utmost kind and helpful nature of the staff. Had an amazing stay here. A special note to their stupendous buffet and spa. Kudos Efcee Sarovar premiere. #Kuchdintoguzariyeefceesarovarpremiereme.

places_with_reviews.name: Nilambag Palace Hotel
address: Rajkot Road, Nilambaug Circle, Nilambaug, Bhavnagar, Gujarat 364002, India

reviews.text:
As I entered the lobby, the friendly and attentive staff greeted me with genuine smiles and a heartfelt welcome. The room I was assigned to exuded elegance and sophistication, beautifully blending modern amenities with the hotel's rich heritage.

The dining experience at Heritage Hotel was an absolute delight. the food was prepared with exquisite finesse and a mastery of flavors. The hotel's amenities were exceptional. The well-maintained fitness center allowed me to stay on top of my workouts. Additionally, the hotel's meticulous attention to cleanliness and hygiene was particularly reassuring during these uncertain times.

An absolute gem. One of the best heritage properties turned into 5 star 🏨. Very well kept and up to date. Your comfort is their top priority.
Room and amenities ⭐⭐⭐⭐ ⭐
Staff & service ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Dining ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Location & value for💲⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Overall all very quiet and kept very clean and neat. For the full experience do dine and try out the local food and the extracurricular activities (swimming, tennis 🎾, shooting range, gym and more)

This review only for restaurant.
Its one of the good palace with restaurant in this area.

We visited at their restaurant and its very royal and beautiful. You can get royal feel   everywhere. Food and service quality is good.

Parking: 2 & 4 wheelar free parking available here.

We went and stayed for 1 day. The property has beautiful rooms and exterior. The restaurant is located inside the palace hotel and the food is very tasty. The property has a swimming pool, however, it is a community swimming pool and is open for public on certain Timings. We stayed in rooms exterior to the palace however the rooms were decent. However, the rooms were in a need of renovation as there were problems of seepage on walls. Moisture could be seen on the wall. Service was good. Overall a good experience.
Rooms badly need renovation. Toilet seats broken, taps n flush at washroom malfunction. The property needs renovation to preserve heritage

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Clarks Collection Bhavnagar
address: Kalubha Rd, Kalanala, Panwadi, Bhavnagar, Gujarat 364001, India

reviews.text: Excellent hospitality and great rooms. One of the best dinners and breakfast we had on our tour of Gujarat. Pretty much in the middle of the city, they do offer staff food for the driver. But our driver couldn't find a spot to sleep because the have just 6 beds. I suppose the hotel could expand on that since drivers need good rest for their work the next day. The restaurant service is wonderful. The hotel staff and the security are very helpful and attentive to guest needs.

Too cramped rooms. Paints peeled off.  Stained mirror.  Bed lost its shape. Returned with a stiff back. Staff was very courteous. Basic cleanliness ok. Complementary breakfast had limited variety. Taste was ok.
We had a very comfortable stay here. Good spread of breakfast. Food quality and taste excellent. Staff very pleasant and helpful.
The shower got jammed and I had to request them thrice to get it repaired. But the service is good. Breakfast is very good. Staff is helpful and the rooms are clean.

Hello  I am not happy with Clarks Bhavnagar
The hospitality isn't good there. Especially the staff isn't cooperative.
I wouldn't recommend this anymore.
The rooms are as expected. Obviously we have paid a good amount to stay.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel The Basil Park
address: 5, opp. Victoria Park, ISCON Mega City, Vidhyanagar, Bhavnagar, Gujarat 364001, India

reviews.text: I am regular customer of The basil park, Bhavnagar from past 6 years. What I experienced  this time is that your food quality specially tea quality I was used to enjoy has been deteriorated. Previous chef was really good. Every year most of the staff has been changed.

During the peak Diwali Festival, I visited Hotel Basil Park, and despite the festive rush, I experienced the best quality of services. The reception staff was exceptional, ensuring a seamless check-in experience. The hotel's prime location added to its appeal. The breakfast spread offered a variety of menus, providing a delightful start to the day. Room service was prompt and efficient, contributing to an overall positive stay. Hotel Basil Park in Bhavnagar combined excellent service with a convenient location, making it a top choice for travelers.

Dear DASJI,

It was all fabulous at Basil Park! Our family and friends thoroughly enjoyed the beautiful setting, delicious food and the great service that you and your team provided. We received the glowing feedback from our guests and we couldn't be happier.

we can't thank you enough for your hard work on all events when we decided to switch the ceremony site due to the DJ in the banquet hall.I was very impressed of how the ceremony went smoothly. You did a fantastic job guiding all of us throughout the ceremony.
We'll definitely stop by to say hello in our next event to Basil Park.Have a great new year!

Best regards,

RAMESH.D.RAJAI
JITENDRA.K.RAJAI
SAGAR.R.RAJAI
RAJAI FAMILY

Rooms are very small, bathroom too is small keeping in mind what they charge. Beds and table are so light weight that they literally move when you are sleeping or touch them. Room service and house keeping  could have been better. The plus point is the location of the hotel

Rana Roy is a good loyal parsion, good behaviour skill.
But some reception person behaviour not good so please improve this.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Virgo Sumeru
address: Waghawadi Rd., Pragati Nagar, Vidhyanagar, Bhavnagar, Gujarat 364002, India

reviews.text: Having wrost experience ever during stay. Not properly clean the room and even while inform for the cleaning to staffs at morning however while come at evening the room was as it is which I left at morning.. They cahrges me Rs. 1000 for Towel due to some black spot showing on it however the towel was already used maximum by the guest and it was already seems dirty however it was washed. I urge them for some waiver on it but the staff didn't ready to listen anything..I am exploring across Gujarat in a month since 8 years and never faced such wrost experiance ever.. I was stayed first time here and faced this issues.. I strongly recommended for avoid to stay here..Only food is quite good..
Best hotel and finest restaurant in bhavnagar.  Reception is very helpful and housekeeping staff is also polite.  Pizzeria food items are awesome.  Keep it up

Everything perfect organized, well managed property, nice food, very clean rooms, bathrooms too. Staff is politie ,ready to help one call. Under one roof , there is  tasty food in restaurant ..   worth stay.

Very good stay. We came for pravin shah wedding group and all arrangements are good. Keep it up. Thnks for hospitality. Housekeeping pappu and reception Mayur Bhai good work. Prince housekeeping also helpful.
Rooms are well maintained and staff is very very helpful. However south indian option need to be more. Hence I went out for breakfast and dinner. Driver facility also good

places_with_reviews.name: HOTEL SANKALP
address: OPP Krishna Nagar Sanskar Mandal, Sanskar Mandal Rd, Hill Drive, Bhavnagar, Gujarat 364002, India

reviews.text:
I don't know why this place has so many negative reviews.
Granted, we weren't in the room much and we didn't use the room service option, but it's clean, comfortable and quiet - I couldn't ask for more in this budget. The room was very spacious. The staff were helpful.
I went with my wife and we faced no issues. There was also another family staying in another room so it's clear that it's not a shady/seedy hotel.
I would recommend this place to anyone looking for a budget-friendly stay.

Had booked family room for my parents but the room was too small. The location was very remote. For breakfast, they just provided poha and nothing else. No toiletries or coffee/tea sachets were provided. When asked for help to book cab they declined saying they don't provide those services and were not even ready to help with any information as well. Not quite 3 star experience.
Good location.we checked in this hotel on 3.4.24, at present renovation work in progress so u find some difficulties bit staff behaviour service is quiet good.
I visited in hotel sankalp 5 years ago very nice clean and comfortable facility very good 😊

I had booked a premium room for 4 people. Staff was rude. No toiletries, no tea coffee items in room. No sense of hospitality. when asked for an auto rickshaw for the airport, staff was rude and said he does not know.
I find this to be a nice hotel with fairly large and clean rooms. The staff was very friendly during our visit and the bed was comfortable.
Its good stay station at bhavnagar near railway station and bus station. It has special service regarding food which is like a home made food, no doubt manu is not big but delicious
Excellent hospitality, good behavior, clean and very affordable.
Hotel staff is very nice room is very clean

First off the good reviews provided are am not sure if it was from customers......

01.The hotel is located in an area that makes you feel Bhavnagar doesn't have good localities, unless you step out of this hotel

02. it survives by duplicating original resort "Vijay palace " located near RTO
people get fooled by word palace.

03. owner is a very very rude guy. who is he to tell me that I arrived next day morning and I don't have a room. I had booked from day 1 afternoon to next day noon. it's my obligation to arrive in this period and leave within check out. He was creating so many situation to make me get out.

04. Rooms were not having basic fan facility, charger point was hanging out

finally when I booked taxi, couple of guys asked me why did you book this hotel. They told me in hindi  some words that expressed ..........

if the owner travels one day to my native, I will revenge him by  giving the best facilities  a hotel should give for Rs.1200 which he has obviously missed giving me in his hotel

There is a veg restaurant by a third party catering who are amazing. Try eating there without staying in amazing palace.

places_with_reviews.name: Aradhana Auberge
address: Leela Circle, Bhavnagar - Sidsar Rd, near Iskon temple, Kailash Dham Society, B.A.D.A. Vikash Path, Bhavnagar, Gujarat 364002, India

reviews.text:
Good hotel and banquet for family functions…
Nice and co-operative staff and owner …
We were there for my sisters wedding in banquet and booked 6 rooms …
Pleasant stay and peaceful function with good food and swift service…..

A best hotel and restaurant in bhavnagar
There was a function of mine in banquet
Was a great function...and great experience every guest was getting service properly ....so I recommend every people if u r having any plan for function for marriage u should definitely go for aradhna hotel ...amazing and tasty food great staff ....thanku specially dhrupadh bhai for not treating as a guest ...the owner was treating as a family
Thanku

Rooms where small.
Bathroom consept of almost a transperant Glass is not comfortable when you are with Family.
Hot water was not available.
Food at restaurant was good and serving was really nice.
Parking is available
Normal Rooms are good but SUITE ROOM IS A LIE IT'S ALMOST SAME AS NORMAL ROOMS JUST A LITTLE BIT SPACIOUS. Food is good enough👌🏻.

Good experience staying there. The location is off beat to city centre but I chose this because its nearer to Ghogha port. But overall location is good. The hotel itself Good. The rooms were neat and clean, spacious, the staff is also nice and friendly. Recommended

places_with_reviews.name: HOTEL SUN 'N' SHINE
address: S.T. Station Road, Panwadi, Sutarwad, Panwadi, Bhavnagar, Gujarat 364001, India

reviews.text: Nice and renovated hotel with good amenities in Bhavnagar City area. Rooms and facilities are very good but location is in densely populated bus stand area with lots of traffic noice. Rates are reasonable here. They also have in-house dining and catering, although you get plenty of eating stuff in walking distance. They did not have their sign board on when we checked in !! Funny !

I tried to book room though phone . When I negotiated the price then person (who picked my phone) told me to try Dormitory in other place in rude manner. This was not acceptable behavior for the customer and got shocked with this. After this experience, I will never stay in this hotel in future.
If they behaved like with customer then what will they do when customer will checked in the hotel.
Good hotel for stay in Bhavnagar Nearly from Bus stop and Bhavnagar commercial hub Three star rating hotel but hotel is under renovation so many work is pending . Old is gold

Worst hotel I have ever visited.
Very rude staff they dont even know how to talk mannerless receptionist!
No water facility on time no hot water service
U have to wait for hours call hundreds of times on reception but they dont reply.
Inspite of prebooking they make u sit for hours and behave like illiterate.
Total waste of money.
U spoil ur trip if u visit such a pathetic hotel With ill mannered staff.

Very pathetic hotel and very rude behaviour of Reception person.
He denied to give me room inspite of advance booking.
Mannerless people.
Also not informed me while booking about renovation of hotel.
